page.title: 14ALLEYNE'S SCHOOL STEVENAGE
page.content: { {Alleyne's}school was first formed in 1558.It was a boarding school and had only one classroom. About 12 people went to the school.Now there are over 700 people there.They have had big extentions built on to it.It has the biggest computer room out of the schools in{Stevenage}which it shares with{Barclay}and{St.Angela's schools.} Their sports are Rugby,Hockey,Cricket {and}Athletics.They have The Grange which is for the 1st year only.They have 12 cricket nets and some tennis courts.They have two{sportshalls.}For the 1st years the prefects do a five-a-side football competition.In the dinneroom there is a plaque with } all the Headmasters names on it. {
